description: This Java class 'StorageService' implements local disk storage handling, including storing files with sanitized paths, generating unique filenames, creating necessary directories, and loading files as resources. It is part of a backend service for managing file storage in an application.

classes.name: StorageService
classes.description: A service class for managing file storage on local disk, including storing and loading files with sandboxed paths.

methods.name: StorageService
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the storage path based on configuration and creates necessary directories.

methods.name: store
methods.description: Stores an uploaded MultipartFile under a specified kind, generating a safe filename and returning metadata about the stored file.

methods.name: loadAsResource
methods.description: Loads a file as a Resource given its path.
